thread.section_title: Ding Reviews | Customer Service Reviews of Ding | www.ding.com
thread.title: Charles Afeaki

author: Charles Afeaki
title: Charles Afeaki
text:
The chat guide that appear on the bottom left hand corner does serve the purpose of encouraging the client not to give up. Procedures are suggested and followed just to find that you are faced with the same problem again especially during the Christmas/New Year vacation time. Throughout the year I have little or no hiccups in forwarding my top up to families especially in the Pacific Islands. It is so easily accessible and reasonably cheap. I wish the organisation the best and successes in your business
Charles Afeaki
